data.name: Portal of Evil: Stolen Runes Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
The gates to another world will open soon! Do you want to feel it with mystical soundtracks?

List of soundtracks:
Track 1 - 01:12
Track 2 - 04:01
Track 3 - 04:00
Track 4 - 03:37
Track 5 - 04:13
Track 6 - 04:00
Track 7 - 03:41

Note:
All soundtrack are in the format .mp3
Album's soundtrack will be placed in a folder containing the game Portal of Evil: Stolen Runes.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP SP3 x64
  • Processor: 1500 MHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: 2000 MHz
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
